title: Spaghetti and Meatballs
description: Delicious homemade spaghetti served with mouthwatering meatballs in rich tomato sauce.
directions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a bowl, combine ground beef, breadcrumbs, Parmesan cheese, parsley, egg, salt, and pepper. Mix well and shape into meatballs.
In a skillet, heat marinara sauce and add meatballs. Cook until meatballs are cooked through.
Serve meatballs and sauce over cooked spaghetti.

title: Chicken Biryani
description: Aromatic and flavorful Indian dish featuring basmati rice, tender chicken, and a blend of spices.
directions: Marinate chicken pieces in yogurt, biryani masala, ginger paste, garlic paste, salt, cilantro, and mint leaves for at least 1 hour.
In a large pot, saute onions until golden brown. Add tomatoes and cook until soft.
Add marinated chicken and cook until chicken is tender.
Cook basmati rice separately and layer rice and chicken mixture.
Cover and cook on low heat until flavors meld.
Serve hot.

title: Pecan Pie
description: Buttery crust filled with sweet and nutty goodness, a perfect ending to any meal.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 F (175 C).
Arrange pecan halves in the pie crust.
In a bowl, whisk together sugar, corn syrup, melted butter, eggs, vanilla extract, and salt.
Pour the mixture over pecans in the pie crust.
Bake for 50-60 minutes, or until the filling is set.
Allow to cool before slicing and serving.

title: Beef Tacos
description: Savory ground beef seasoned with traditional spices and served in warm tortillas with fresh toppings.
ingredients: Sour cream and salsa for serving
directions: In a skillet, cook ground beef until browned. Drain excess fat.
Add taco seasoning and water. Simmer until thickened.
Warm tortillas in a dry skillet or microwave.
Assemble tacos with beef, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, onions, and cilantro.
Serve with sour cream and salsa.

title: Garlic Butter Shrimp
description: Tender shrimp sauteed in garlic butter and served with a squeeze of lemon.
ingredients: 1 lb large shrimp, peeled and deveined
directions: In a skillet, melt butter over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and red pepper flakes. Cook until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook until pink and opaque.
Stir in chopped parsley and lemon juice.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: Colorful medley of fresh vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce and served over steamed rice.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, carrots, broccoli, snow peas, etc.)
directions: In a wok or skillet, heat vegetable oil over high heat.
Add minced garlic and grated ginger. Stir-fry for a minute.
Add mixed vegetables and stir-fry until crisp-tender.
Stir in soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sesame oil.
Serve vegetable stir-fry over cooked jasmine rice.
